title: Gold Support-ADC + Mid/Top mains LF chill people to play with
body:
Both of us are gold V currently, formerly plat and we're looking for chill people who won't rage but still want to try and be good at the game and try more team oriented gameplay than just regular solo-queue. Preferably with high silver to low plat experience, 18 years or over and willing to voice (discord, skype etc).  We're looking for ADC (or support), Top and Jungle players.

If you are interested send us a message or leave one below with your IGN and role.
Our IGNs are VoidGiraffe and Remembrance

replies.body: chowdhury shaheb my ign! hit me up
i ended pre season 6 as silver 1 currently silver 4 i main mid but can play top aswell. im looking to join a group and improve
Was silver 3 last season probably too low but im interested. Support main looking to join a group and improve my play {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I'm interested, was g5 last season havent done ranked this season cause I've heard bad things. I play ADC and wouldnt mind having a go at getting a group going.
